title: Are immature sexual remarks considered toxic?
body: For example, someone in all chat starts saying shit like "Pound my anus, daddy". Or "I'll make you feel better if you eat my booty".

replies.body:
Its not really toxicity, unless its directed at anyone.
thats harrassment.
I think they can be, especially if it's clear those comments are unwanted and making someone uncomfortable
